text: Mme a ba ne ba tlhaloganya (gore Modimo o tlaa neela ba bangwe poloko fa ba gana go e amogela)? Ee, gonne le mo malatsing a bogologolo a lobaka lwa ga Moshe, Modimo o ne wa re o tlaa dira batho ba one go nna lefufa o bo o leka go ba tsosa ka go naya poloko ya one dichaba tsa dieleele tsa baheitane.
